channel.title: CVE Feed for nextscripts -- NextScripts: Social Networks Auto-Poster
channel.description: The latest CVEs for nextscripts -- NextScripts: Social Networks Auto-Poster

item.title: CVE-2024-2088|2024-05-22T06:50:34.168Z -- nextscripts -- nextscripts%3A%20social%20networks%20auto-poster
item.description: The NextScripts: Social Networks Auto-Poster plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 4.4.3 via the 'nxs_getExpSettings' function. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber access and above, to extract sensitive data including social network API keys and secrets.
